channel.title: VitalizePK | Back & Better
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/apWaGd1.png[/img]
[B]Introduction -[/B] Been speaking to a few friends and they've suggested that I re-release VitalizePK to the public, I also saw on the download thread that people wanted someone to put an online version up for them to play. I have decided to redevelop the beloved VitalizePK. I won't be using the same base nor will I be using the same client, I will most likely use content from the last VitalizePK as that's what everyone seemed to enjoy. The server will be a 317 with the exception of a few modern items such as Arcane Steam, Staff of light etc. Mini-games and skilling will play a big part in Vitalize as they'll give you advantages in the wilderness, for example Barbarian Assault for Torso, Fighter hat etc. Fishing spots in deep wilderness where you can fish for rocktails and such. [/CENTER] [B]Developers -[/B]
[ul][li]Envy- [/li][/ul]
[B]Content -[/B]
[ul][li]Flawless switching[/li] [li]Clipped following[/li] [li]Re-written skills[/li] [li]Enchanted combat[/li] [li]Functional duel arena (No dupes etc.)[/li] [li]Clean client[/li] [list] [li]Low data usage[/li] [li]Uses update server[/li] [li]Options to change hits and such[/li] [/list][/ul]
[CENTER][B]Media -[/B] [IMG]http://media-cache-ec3.pinimg.com/192x/ca/ee/58/caee5824fcdff55658382b4a0892bf82.jpg[/img] None at the moment.[/CENTER]
[b]Updates -[/b] ____________________
[U]19th May[/U]
[ul][li]Server development started[/li] [li]Client underwent major development[/li] [li]525 game frame added[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/yiK1Yg2.png[/img]
[ul][li]Orbs functional etc.[/li] [li]Update server added[/li] [li]Cache packed 600+ anims etc.[/li] [li]603 char models implanted (from original VPK)[/li] [li]XP orb added[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://s23.postimg.org/3yoe04mq3/Untitled.png[/img]
[ul][li]Re-did item class[/li] [li]Cleaned majority of the other classes[/li] [li]Started working on combat[/li] [li]Working on hit icons (changing to 600+ ones)[/li][/ul]
____________________
[U]20th of May[/U]
[ul][li]Added starter interface[/li] [list] [li]Select a class you wish to be[/li] [li]You get given EXP lamps + starter kit[/li][/list] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RACI0rU.png[/img] [list] [li]Dragon defender added[/li] [/list] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FWJt3ed.png[/img] [list] [li]Curses prayers added[/li] [list] [li]Give right bonuses[/li] [li]Correct anims + GFX[/li] [li]Correct functions etc.[/li] [/list] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/86n5Lop.png[/img] ____________________ [/list][/ul] [/list][/list]

item.title: VitalizePK | Back & Better
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Xx Weed Xx, post:8, topic:519865”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=638358.msg4303690#msg4303690 date=1369425996]
Don’t have characters above the selections for the starter pack, just have a large skill icon for each skill. That being said, you won’t need the large background sprite that you’re using. And yes, I do know what I’m talking about when it comes to interfaces. Other than that, good luck with it.
[/quote]

I’m not doubting you. What do you mean by large skill icon for each skill?[/quote]
For your interface, you’re using in-game characters with combat gear to indicate which type of starter pack they will receive if they click that button. Instead of using in-game character sprites, use skill icons for each one and just in-large the icons a bit. But also, don’t use such a big background and the icons won’t look as small. Don’t forget to center it as well.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

Loveandpower:

any updates yet? last media was from 20th of may

MwIwBWP.png762×500

Working on a custom quest called the Trapped Victim, won’t tell you much about it as I want it to be a surprise when the server is released.

Read full topic

item.title: VitalizePK | Back & Better
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

Loveandpower:

BY THE WAY I disagree with the starter…you don’t have an option for a skiller

I’m turning it eco rather than PK now, not a lot to do when developing a PK server. I will add a skiller option and change the barrows etc. to iron, ghostly, leather etc. so it’s more suitable for an eco.

Read full topic
